text: hananim-i neohuiui jim-eul deol-eo jusa neohui gaunde eon-yagham-i iss-eum eul asigo eunhyeleul bepusini neohui gaunde baegmyeong-i innaehaneunja issdamyeon ibaegmyeong-eul mullichil geos-iyo cheonmyeong-ila myeon hananim-ui tteus-e ttala icheonmyeong-eul mullichige hasini hananim-eun innaeha neunjawa hamkke hasim-ila
